snippet: President Obama needs to make good on his promise to fix a broken election system.
abstract: Editorial calls on Pres Obama to push for repairing nation's broken election system in his State of the Union address; contends that Congress must come up with legislation that will modernize voter registration and offer easier access to ballots.
lead_paragraph: President Obama needs to make good on his promise to fix a broken election system.

headline.seo: Voting Should Be Easy: Modernize Registration
headline.main: Modernize Registration and Require Early Voting Periods
headline.print_headline: Modernize registration and require early voting periods
